theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: This theory focuses on the insulin-like signaling pathway regulating longevity via DAF-16 and OLD-1 in C. elegans, fitting the IIS and FOXO transcription factor theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS pathway and DAF-16's role in aging and immunity, central to insulin/IGF-1 signaling mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IIS pathway regulating lifespan via DAF-16/FOXO and cross-talk with stress pathways, fitting the IIS-DAF-16 subcluster.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details IIS pathway and JNK/MAPK interaction with DAF-16 in longevity regulation, part of IIS-FOXO signaling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on genome-wide DAF-16/FOXO recruitment downstream of IIS, central to insulin/IGF-1 signaling regulation of aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes conserved IIS pathway regulating lifespan across species via epigenetic and genetic mechanisms, core IIS theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS pathway modulation by small molecules activating DAF-16 and related transcription factors, fitting IIS-FOXO regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links IIS pathway to iron homeostasis and aging trade-offs via DAF-16 regulation, part of IIS-mediated longevity mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on PKB/FOXO signaling switch in aging and cancer, a key IIS downstream regulatory mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes insulin receptor mutations affecting lifespan via methionine metabolism reprogramming, linked to IIS pathway modulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes germline-intestine endocrine signaling involving DAF-16 and DAF-12 in longevity, integrated with IIS pathway.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and DAF-16 Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes chromatin modifier ZFP1 integrating IIS and dietary restriction pathways via DAF-16, part of IIS regulatory network.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Growth Hormone and IGF Signaling Trade-Off Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IGF system modulation of aging and lifespan, highlighting IGF binding proteins and proteases, fitting GH/IGF signaling theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Growth Hormone and IGF Signaling Trade-Off Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes GH/IGF-1/insulin signaling reduction extending lifespan and trade-offs between growth/reproduction and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Growth Hormone and IGF Signaling Trade-Off Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes trade-off between growth hormone levels, thymic involution, immune function, and lifespan, fitting GH-related trade-offs.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Growth Hormone and IGF Signaling Trade-Off Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Classic disposable soma theory emphasizing resource allocation trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance, related to GH/IGF trade-offs.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Activation and Stress Resistance Theory in Social Insects
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on reproductive activation inducing stress resistance and longevity in social insects, a distinct reproductive-stress resistance mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life-History Pace-of-Life Syndrome Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes life-history trade-offs shaping pace of life, survival, and reproduction strategies, a life-history evolutionary framework.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Trade-Off and Conditional Effects Theory of Longevity
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on antagonistic gene effects, gene-gene and gene-environment interactions influencing longevity, a genetic trade-off theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Trade-Off and Conditional Effects Theory of Longevity
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes genetic trade-offs in aging lung diseases with opposite allelic effects, fitting genetic trade-off mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Caloric Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes caloric restriction effects on metabolism and longevity, a core dietary restriction mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Caloric Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on dietary restriction extending lifespan and improving metabolic health, fitting DR/CR theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Caloric Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes dietary restriction effects on aging biomarkers and lifespan in primates, part of DR/CR mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Caloric Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on caloric restriction reducing age-related diseases and oxidative stress, fitting DR/CR longevity mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Caloric Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes dietary restriction-induced state changes modulated by alpha-lipoic acid affecting survival trajectories, part of DR mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Caloric Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on dietary restriction extending lifespan via TOR-eIF4H translation regulation, a nutrient sensing and DR mechanism.
